snippet.title: The Architect: Paris - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
🚀 Available NOW on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1525620/The_Architect_Paris/?beta=0 ! 🚀 
🎉 15% OFF the first week !!! 🎉

Turn the capital of France into a medieval looking city or a futuristic one, 
build a business district surrounded by parks, create gigantic plazas worthy of the greatest soviet cities, imagine neighborhoods where historical architecture blends in with the most modern designs… 

Draw your own buildings, parks and plazas with an accuracy never seen before. 
The powerful brick-to-building system developed by Enodo Games will give you complete control over your projects.

Destroy. Draw. Build. And then, start over as many times as you wish.

Lastly, admire your work, choosing weather and lightning conditions that highlight your new city. Share your creations with players around the world through videos and pictures.

🌍 Come visit us on our website : http://www.enodo.games/our-games

📢 Join the community on our social networks to get the latest news:

► Discord : https://discord.gg/8UWznw7VFJ
► Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/TheArchitectParis
► Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/the_architect_paris/?hl=fr
► Twitter : https://twitter.com/architect_paris?lang=fr
► Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClv9zohT4YCkoxd--4v0aIg

🎵 Music used: "Prelude No. 2 in C Minor" by Arandel (InFiné)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yZ4sBLDR7jI&ab_channel=InFin%C3%A9Music

#thearchitectparis #enodogames #videogames #architecture #paris #madewithunity #unity3D #france #pcgaming #hqgraphics #design #urbanplanning #february2021 #steam
